subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: After trailing by as many as 41 points, St. John’s fell to Maryland during the semifinals of the Coaches vs. Cancer Classic in a contest that was more a train wreck than a basketball game.
snippet: After trailing by as many as 41 points, St. John’s fell to Maryland during the semifinals of the Coaches vs. Cancer Classic in a contest that was more a train wreck than a basketball game.
